node.title: Ukraine says one soldier killed, 6 wounded in separatist shelling
node.description: The Ukrainian military said on Wednesday one soldier had been killed and six wounded in shelling by pro-Russian separatists in east Ukraine in the past 24 hours as ceasefire violations remain at aâ€¦
node.content:
["The Ukrainian military said on Wednesday one soldier had been killed and six wounded in shelling by pro-Russian separatists in east Ukraine in the past 24 hours as ceasefire violations remain at a high level.", "", "
Image released by the Ukraine Ministry Defence Ministry shows Ukrainian soldiers carrying out combat training. (File photo). Photo: AFP / EyePress News
", "The military said on its Facebook page it had recorded 96 incidents of shelling by separatists over the past 24 hours compared with 84 a day earlier. It said separatist forces used heavy artillery, mortars and Grad rocket systems.", "Ukraine has accused Russia of provoking violence, saying it used it as a pretext to formally recognise eastern Ukraine as independent and move its troops into the region, precipitating a crisis that the West fears could unleash a major war.", "- Reuters"]
